code: import axios from"axios";import{GET_ARTICLES,GET_ARTICLE,ADD_ARTICLE,DELETE_ARTICLE,ARTICLES_LOADING}from"./types";export var getArticles=function getArticles(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setArticlesLoading());axios.get("/api/articles").then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_ARTICLES,payload:res.data});});};};export var getArticle=function getArticle(id){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setArticlesLoading());axios.get("/api/articles/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_ARTICLE,payload:res.data});});};};export var addArticle=function addArticle(article){return function(dispatch){axios.post("/api/articles",article).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:ADD_ARTICLE,payload:res.data});});};};export var deleteArticle=function deleteArticle(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("/api/articles/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:DELETE_ARTICLE,payload:id});});};};export var setArticlesLoading=function setArticlesLoading(){return{type:ARTICLES_LOADING};};
